comments:

I tried again with another workspace and the problem disappeared.

When I tried creating Dynamic Web project again later, 
I hit the problem a second time with another new workspace but the problem disappeared after restarting the workbench.  This time, the error is:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 2 568 2006-02-11 00:35:27.386
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while setting project description.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 2 35 2006-02-11 00:35:27.386
!MESSAGE Nature does not exist: org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.nature.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 128996 ***

I'm getting the problem:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at
org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.internal.FacetsSelectionPanel$LabelProvider.getCo
lumnImage(FacetsSelectionPanel.java:1735)

everytime with new workspace.  The problem sometimes go away after restarting the workbench but there are numerous times when it keeps occuring even with restarting.  When it happens,the only way to get out of the situation is to kill the workbench.
